resources.string: Press the back key again to return to previous screen.
When roaming abroad, you can only download update via Wi-Fi network. Connect to Wi-Fi network?
Wi-Fi not available. Turn on Wi-Fi or disable Wi-Fi only. Using mobile networks may incur additional charges.
Check your network connection and try again.
Formatting will erase all data. Continue?
Save your changes or discard them?
The phone disconnected from the network before the download completed. The download will restart when the phone reconnects to the network.
Unable to open %s. Tap Settings and go to App info > Permissions, then allow the following permission and try again:
Agree to the terms of the %1$s.
Unable to record videos. Insert SD card into Gear 360, then try again.
Unable to take pictures. Insert SD card into Gear 360, then try again.
A lens or sensor error has occurred.
All Gear 360 settings will be reset to their defaults.
An additional firmware update is required. Tap DOWNLOAD below to download the update and automatically copy it to the Gear 360.
Bluetooth is turned off on your mobile device. Bluetooth will be turned on.
Cannot edit video. File corrupted or not supported.
Check your Gear 360 Bluetooth settings and try again.

Downloading may result in additional charges. Keep your mobile device and Gear 360 connected via Bluetooth while the download is being copied to the Gear 360. You will be able to use your mobile device during the download.
Enable %s to connect to your Samsung accessory.
Failed to copy the firmware update to the Gear 360.
Failed to copy the firmware update to the Gear 360. Tap OK to try again.
Gear 360 overheating. It will power off to cool down.
Record 360° or 180° time lapse videos. Set the interval between each picture, then all pictures will be combined into a time lapse video.

Record 360° or 180° videos. To save time and storage space, select a time to record a video for. Then, when that time has elapsed, the video will continue to be recorded but will be overwritten from the start.
Recording stopped. Gear 360 overheating. Resume recording after device cools down.
Tap the Camera button to go to the Gear 360 viewfinder.
Tap the Gear 360 tab to view videos and pictures taken with and saved on your Gear 360.
Tap the Mobile device tab to view videos and pictures taken with your Gear 360 that are saved on your mobile device.
The Gear 360 connection settings will be reset to their defaults.
The Gear 360 device settings will be reset to their defaults.
The SD card is currently not compatible with your Gear 360. Back up any files on the SD card, format the SD card, then try again.
The update package has been downloaded and copied to your Gear 360. Tap INSTALL below to install the update.
The update package will be installed and the Gear 360 will restart.
There is not enough space in your Gear 360 storage (%1$s %2$s needed). Delete some items and try again.
There is not enough space in your Gear 360 storage.
There is not enough space in your mobile device storage (%1$s %2$s needed). Delete some items and try again.

This function will attach, embed, and store geographical location data within each picture that you take or video that you record. Use caution when you send, share, distribute, transmit, or copy these pictures and videos since they contain information about where the picture or video was taken or recorded.
Unable to copy the firmware update to your Gear 360. Connect your mobile device to a charger and recharge the battery to at least %d%% to transfer the firmware update.
Your Gear 360 will be disconnected from your mobile device. To reconnect, Bluetooth must be used.
3. Press the OK key to indicate that you want to connect the Gear 360 to the mobile device.
4. Select the Gear 360 you want to connect to on your mobile device, then check that the number shown above is shown in the Gear 360 Manager app.
Location is disabled. To edit the location for this image, tap SETTINGS, then enable Location.
Record videos with the screen turned off to save power. When you tap the screen, the viewfinder will appear.
The latest version is already installed.
To view your images and videos on your Gear VR, insert your mobile device into your Gear VR.
Show the status of the Gear 360 via the LED indicator.
Remove wind noise from recorded videos.
Maximum number of displayed items (%d) exceeded.
This video has not been exported. Export or discard the video?
You can select up to %d items.
Videos recorded in 3840 x 1920 resolution are saved in a lower resolution on your device. Use the PC software provided to save videos in their original resolution.
2. Press and hold the Connection key on your Gear 360 to make your Gear 360 available for connection.
Copying of update to Gear 360 stopped. Gear 360 overheating. Resume copying after device cools down.
Attach, embed, and store geographical location data within each picture and video.
Set the sound volume and whether to use the LED indicator.
Format the SD card in your Gear 360. This will erase all data on the SD card.
Reset Gear 360 device settings, connection settings, or both.
Reset your device settings to their defaults.
Unable to view Gear 360 tab while recording video.
Disconnect your Gear 360 from your PC and try again.
There is not enough space in your device storage. Delete some items and try again.
Reset your connection settings to their defaults.
Unable to view Gear 360 tab or use viewfinder while copying firmware update.
Unable to update the software. A network or server error occurred. Try again later.
To enable Location tags, make sure the Locating method in Settings > Privacy and safety > Location is set to GPS, Wi-Fi, and mobile networks or Wi-Fi and mobile networks.
I agree to the use of %s.
Unable to download the Gear 360 firmware update to your mobile device. Connect your mobile device to a charger and recharge the battery to at least %d%% to download the firmware update.
The latest software update is ready to be installed.
View Gear 360 videos and pictures that have been transferred to your mobile device.
View videos and pictures taken with your Gear 360 and saved on its SD card.
2. Press and hold the Connection key.
Press the back key again to close the app.
Unable to view Gear 360 tab while taking pictures or recording video on Gear 360.

During the installation, you cannot use your Gear 360. The Gear 360 settings will revert to their defaults and will need to be reconfigured after installation. After the installation, your data should be preserved, but we recommend that you back up important data before installation to avoid unexpected data loss.
Preview not supported in Time lapse mode
Insert an SD card into your Gear 360, then try again.
Cannot edit video. File not supported or corrupted.
Recording stopped. Gear 360 SD card too slow.
Pinch the screen to zoom out from 360° videos or pictures. Spread your fingers apart to zoom in.
Unable to copy the firmware update to your Gear 360. Connect your Gear 360 to a charger and recharge the battery to at least %d%%, then tap CHECK FOR UPDATES to download and/or transfer the update.
Select whether to use the front lens or the rear lens by default when playing 360° videos or viewing 360° pictures.
Location disabled.\nTo use Location tags, enable Location in quick settings panel.
Reset all settings to their defaults.
Maximum number of items that can be selected (%d) exceeded.
This app does not support Multi window.
Dims the brightness if you broadcast for more than %d minutes without touching the screen to save battery power.
Auto save your video to Gallery when your broadcast has stopped.
Unable to add a recipient. The recipient\'s number is invalid.
%d invitations will be sent via SMS when broadcast starts.
You are invited to my broadcast.
Double tap to expand the list.
Double tap to collapse the list.
Make your video public on YouTube for everyone to watch.
Location will also be turned on and the Locating method will be set to GPS, Wi-Fi, and mobile networks.
Can\'t save details. Title field empty.
Your pictures and videos will now contain information about where they were taken or recorded, so be careful when sharing them.
To use Location tags, the following settings will be changed:
The Locating method will be set to GPS, Wi-Fi, and mobile networks.
To use Location tags, make sure Locating method is set to GPS, Wi-Fi, and mobile networks, or Wi-Fi and mobile networks.
Location turned off.\nTo use location tags, turn on Location in the quick settings panel.
There is not enough space in your device storage. The default storage location will be changed to your SD card.
There is not enough space on your SD card. The default storage location will be changed to your device storage.
Share your link with the only people who can watch your broadcast.
Maximum file size reached. Video will be saved and new video will be started.
Maximum recording time reached. Video will be saved and broadcast will continue.
Insert memory card to use Camera.
There is not enough space in your device storage. Tap Disable Auto save to continue to broadcast without saving your video.
To use Live Broadcast, sign in to YouTube to verify your account.
Your broadcast has been interrupted. Tap Resume to continue your broadcast.
A network error has occurred. Check your network connection.
The device time and server time do not match. Go to Settings > Date and time, then enable Automatic and try again.
Your network connection is weak. Check your network connection and try again.
Unable to connect to mobile networks while Flight mode is enabled. Connect to a Wi-Fi network instead, or disable Flight mode and try again.
Insert your phone into your Gear VR.
Tap here to download the latest update.
Reset your Gear 360\'s connection settings to their defaults.
Reset your Gear 360\'s device settings to their defaults.
Reset your Gear 360 to its default settings.
Reset the settings on your Gear 360.
Use the LED indicator to show the status of the Gear 360.
Tap here to install the update.
Save battery life by dimming the screen automatically if you broadcast for more than 5 minutes without touching the screen.
Only share your broadcast with people who receive a link to it.
Tap here to resume your broadcast.
Share large files easily with your contacts.
Tap here to update to the latest version.
Tap here to manage your Gear 360.
Press and hold the Menu key.
Pinch the screen to zoom out. Spread your fingers apart to zoom in.
"On your phone, select the Gear 360 you want to connect to. Then confirm that the number shown on the Gear 360 matches the number shown in the Gear 360 App."
"On your tablet, select the Gear 360 you want to connect to. Then confirm that the number shown on the Gear 360 matches the number shown in the Gear 360 App."
Immerse yourself with the Gear VR
Recording videos with the screen turned off saves battery power. Just tap the screen to see the preview again.
Capture and view 360° pictures and videos directly from your phone. Use the live preview to make sure you always get the best angle.
Capture and view 360° pictures and videos directly from your tablet. Use the live preview to make sure you always get the best angle.
Live broadcast your 360° videos to the world.
Put yourself out there by live broadcasting your experiences to your friends.
Press the OK key to confirm that you want to connect your Gear 360 to your phone.
Press the OK key to confirm that you want to connect your Gear 360 to your tablet.
The Gear 360 App lets you get the most out of your Gear 360.
The Gear 360 App helps you get the most out of your Gear 360.
Select which social networks you want to share your 360 live broadcasts on.
Share a link to your Live broadcast with your friends and family. Recipients will receive a link to the broadcast by text message.

"This service provides you with a personal 360 live broadcasting service connected to YouTube Live. By using this service, you certify that you own all rights to the content or that you are authorized by the owner to make the content public."
Take pictures or record videos with your Gear 360 to view them here.
Swipe the screen to move around your 360° pictures and videos.
"Turn on your Gear 360, then press and hold the Menu key to make it detectable."
"To use the Gear 360 App, you must read and agree to the following terms of service."

"You can\'t use your Gear 360 while the update is being installed. Your Gear 360 settings may revert to their defaults. Installing this update shouldn\'t affect your data, but we recommend that you back up important data before installing this update to avoid unexpected data loss."
You can invite viewers to your broadcast by sending them a link.
Your Gear 360 will be disconnected from your phone.
The update wasn\'t copied to your Gear 360.
"To download updates while roaming, your phone needs to be connected to a Wi-Fi network."
Your phone disconnected from the network before the update was downloaded. The rest of the update will be downloaded the next time your phone connects to a network.
Your tablet disconnected from the network before the update was downloaded. The rest of the update will be downloaded the next time your tablet connects to a network.
There isn\'t enough space on your phone to save this update (%s MB). Delete some items and try again.
There isn\'t enough space on your tablet to save this update (%s MB). Delete some items and try again.
There isn\'t enough space on your Gear 360 to save this update (%s MB). Delete some items and try again.
"To connect to your Gear 360, Wi-Fi Direct needs to be turned on. Wi-Fi will be turned on automatically when you open the Gear 360 App."
Your tablet will be paired with your Gear 360.
Your phone will be paired with your Gear 360.
"To use the Gear 360 App, you need to update it first. After it\'s updated, reconnect your Gear 360 to your tablet."
"To use the Gear 360 App, you need to update it first. After it\'s updated, reconnect your Gear 360 to your phone."
"To connect to your Gear 360, Bluetooth needs to be turned on."
This app might not be compatible with your tablet.
This app might not be compatible with your phone.
Your system software has been modified in an unauthorized way.
"To edit the location for this picture, Location must be turned on in Settings."
"To use 360 Live broadcast, sign in to YouTube."
Share a link to your Live broadcast with your friends and family. Just add a message to your post and select a social network.
The recipient\'s phone number isn\'t valid.
"There isn\'t enough space on your phone to save this broadcast. To continue broadcasting, you need to turn off Auto save."
"There isn\'t enough space on your tablet to save this broadcast. To continue broadcasting, you need to turn off Auto save."
Your network connection is unstable. Check your network connection and try again.
This will erase all of the data on the card.
Gear 360 overheating. Can\'t copy update. Resume copying after Gear 360 cools down.
"Some of the Gear 360s found can\'t be connected to your phone. Update the Gear 360 App, then try again."
"The SD card in your Gear 360 can\'t be used. Back up any files on the SD card, format the SD card, then try again."
Network connection unstable. Video quality may be affected.

Downloading this update may result in additional charges. Keep your phone and Gear 360 connected using Bluetooth while the update is being copied to the Gear 360. You can continue using your phone while updating your Gear 360.

Downloading this update may result in additional charges. Keep your tablet and Gear 360 connected using Bluetooth while the update is being copied to the Gear 360. You can continue using your tablet while updating your Gear 360.
A new version of the Gear 360 App is being downloaded. Tap STOP to close the Gear 360 App and stop the download.
Check the connection to your Gear 360 and try again.
Charge your phone to at least %d%% before copying the update.
Charge your tablet to at least %d%% before copying the update.
Charge your Gear 360 to at least %d%% before copying the update.

Check your network connection and try again.

Unable to connect to your Samsung Gear 360. Two Samsung Gear 360 apps are installed:

- Samsung Gear 360 Manager

- Samsung Gear 360 (new)

Delete one and try connecting again.

Note: The new Samsung Gear 360 app supports many new features, except for using NFC tags via your Gear 360.
Unable to open Gear 360 Manager. Tap SETTINGS, go to App info > Permissions, then allow the following permissions and try again:

Preparing to take picture. Please wait\u2026

Unable to take photos. There is not enough space in your Gear 360 storage.
Take high dynamic range pictures in single or dual (360°) lens mode. HDR pictures are made by combining multiple pictures of the same scene to produce rich details.
Automatically remove wind noise from your videos.
Attach, embed, and store geographical location data within each picture and video.
Select which lens to show in the center of the preview.
Take 360° or 180° pictures at certain intervals, then combine them to make smooth time lapse videos.
Save space by recording 360° or 180° videos for a certain amount of time, then continuing to record the video by overwriting your recording from the start.
Take a series of pictures at preset time intervals, then combine them to create 360° or 180° time lapse videos.
Take multiple pictures at different exposures and combine them to create brighter 360° or 180° images.

Continuously record 360° or 180° videos without using up too much storage space. Your Gear 360 will record videos for the time limit you set. After you reach the limit, the Gear 360 will start recording over what you\'ve just recorded from the beginning. This feature is great for catching actions that require multiple takes, like skateboard tricks.
Select which lens\'s view will appear at the center of your 360° pictures and videos.

You can use the SD card in your phone as the default storage location for your Gear 360 pictures and videos.\n\nTo change the default storage location later, go to Gallery settings > Storage location.

Make your video available on YouTube for everyone to watch.

You can use the SD card in your tablet as the default storage location for your Gear 360 pictures and videos.\n\nTo change the default storage location later, go to Gallery settings > Storage location.

Use Google\'s location service help apps to find your location quickly without draining your battery. Anonymous location data will occasionally be sent to Google, even when no apps are running.
Live broadcast stopped. Gear 360 overheating. Resume broadcasting after it cools down.

WLAN not available. Turn on WLAN or disable WLAN only. Using mobile networks may incur additional charges.
To enable Location tags, make sure the Locating method in Settings > Privacy and safety > Location is set to GPS, WLAN, and mobile networks or WLAN and mobile networks.
To use Location tags, make sure Locating method is set to GPS, WLAN, and mobile networks, or WLAN and mobile networks.
Your account has been blocked by %s.
I agree to the Collection and Use of Personal Information policy.
The system log data for a previous error report is still being sent.\n\nTry again later or send this error report without system log data.
Can\'t send error report. No text entered.
Can\'t send error report. Problem frequency not selected.
Feedback sent. Reply will be sent as soon as possible. Reply may take longer if feedback not sent during business hours.
Your iPhone doesn\'t support this app.
Tap the links below and read the agreements carefully before agreeing to them.
I agree to the End User License Agreement.
Enter your question.\n\nFor example: How do I connect a new Gear 360?

Enter the details of your problem.

For example: I can't connect to my Gear 360 using Bluetooth.

Try to send the system log data within 3 minutes of the problem occurring.
Send a system log to help us solve your problem quickly and accurately.
Responses to your questions and error reports will appear here.

Your system log will be sent to Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd for analysis. Your system log may contain information from the third-party apps installed on your phone. The system log data will only be used to analyze the problem and improve the Gear 360 App. Sending your system log may result in additional charges.\n\nWait for the system log to be attached before writing the details of your problem.
You won\'t receive a response from Samsung.
Turn on your Gear 360, press and hold the Menu key, then select Android to show your Gear 360 here.
Automatically correct camera tilt in your Live broadcasts.
Automatically correct pictures and videos that appear tilted. Tilt correction is applied when the picture or video is saved.
To connect your Gear 360 to your phone, press and hold the Menu key, select iOS, then press the OK key.
To connect your phone to your Gear 360, go to Settings > Wi-Fi, then select your Gear 360.
On your iPhone, in Settings > Wi-Fi, select your Gear 360 and enter the password shown on the status screen of the Gear 360.
To connect your phone to your Gear 360, go to Settings > Wi-Fi, then select your Gear 360.
%s closed to switch to Samsung DeX.
%s closed to switch to Galaxy DeX.
Videos captured in 4096 x 2048 resolution are saved in 3840 x 1920 resolution on your phone. Use the Gear 360 ActionDirector Software to save videos in their original resolution.
Pictures captured in 5472 x 2736 resolution are saved in 4096 x 2048 resolution on your phone. Use the Gear 360 ActionDirector Software to save pictures in their original resolution.
Download the latest firmware for your Gear 360 below. The update will automatically be copied to your Gear 360 after it\'s downloaded.
The locating method will be set to GPS, WLAN, and mobile networks.
To download updates while roaming, your phone needs to be connected to a WLAN.
To connect to your Gear 360, WLAN Direct needs to be turned on. WLAN will be turned on automatically when you open the Gear 360 App.
I agree to allow the use of WLAN.
To connect to your Gear 360 using WLAN Direct, Mobile hotspot will be turned off.
Location will also be turned on and the locating method will be set to GPS, WLAN, and mobile networks.
To use this function, update Google Play services.
Anyone with a direct link can watch your broadcast.
Anyone can find and watch your broadcast.
Only you can watch your broadcast.
To use location tags and record live broadcasts, you need to update Google Play services.
Can\'t use location tags or record live broadcasts until you update Google Play services.

This service will allow you to broadcast videos live on social media that supports live streaming. You can simply invite friends and family members to watch your live video broadcast via text messages. You represent, warrant, and covenant that you will not use this service to live stream any content that (a) violates law, regulation, treaty, or third-party rights, or (b) is unlawful, threatening, abusive, obscene, defamatory, libellous, pornographic, vulgar, or racially or ethnically offensive. Samsung may suspend or discontinue any aspect of this service any time. You acknowledge that Samsung does not and cannot control the live streaming of videos. Accordingly, Samsung expressly disclaims any and all liability resulting from, or related to, such videos. The availability and features of this service may differ depending on your smartphone model, OS, and country.
Preparing to share the broadcast link\u2026
Press the OK (Shutter) key on your Gear 360 to complete the connection.
Can\'t start broadcast while recording video.
To complete the update, your Gear 360 will restart automatically.
Anyone with the link can view
Anyone can search for and view
Leaving this screen will cancel the download.
If you have any questions or problems while using your Gear 360, send a message to Samsung Customer Service.

During the installation, you can\'t use your Gear 360 and it will reboot automatically. The Gear 360 settings will revert to their defaults and will need to be reconfigured after installation. After the installation, your data should be preserved, but we recommend that you back up important data before installation to avoid unexpected data loss.
Tap STOP to close the Gear 360 app and stop the download.
Check out your 360 broadcast on %s. Longer broadcasts might take more time to upload.
Updating Gear 360 app. Try again later.
Your broadcast was ended due to inappropriate content.
There are 2 versions of the Gear 360 App installed on your phone. Delete the older app (Gear 360 Manager), then try to connect again.\n\nNote: The new Samsung Gear 360 App doesn\'t support NFC tags.
The new Samsung Gear 360 App supports your Gear 360, but some functions, such as NFC tags and Live broadcast, won\'t work.
